Name: Majesty Metals
Details: Majesty Metals & Manufacturing is the oldest military manufacturer in the Magistracy of Canopus. With facilities on the capital world of Canopus, as well as Dunianshire, Majesty is the sole domestic provider of heavy arms to the Magistracy Armed Forces. The company's efforts to supply the MAF with weapons have been plagued with supply issues, due to mismanagment of mining resources by the Canopian government.
